results.title: Pleiotropic Effects of Simvastatin on Wound Healing in Diabetic Mice.
results.text_hl: Seven days prior to wounding, the @<m>DISEASE_Myotonic_Dystrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009223 @@@DM@@@ + SIM group was started on oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (0.25 mg/kg/day).

citations.NLM: Sukpat S, Israsena N, Patumraj S. Pleiotropic Effects of Simvastatin on Wound Healing in Diabetic Mice. J Med Assoc Thai. 2016 Feb;99(2):213-9. PMID: 27249902
citations.BibTeX: @article{27249902, title={Pleiotropic Effects of Simvastatin on Wound Healing in Diabetic Mice.}, author={Sukpat S and Israsena N and Patumraj S}, journal={J Med Assoc Thai}, volume={99}, number={2}, pages={213-9}}

results.title: [Simvastatin prevented myocardium of diabetes rats from apoptosis through inhibition of oxidative stress].
results.journal: Zhongguo Ying Yong Sheng Li Xue Za Zhi
results.text_hl: Then the modeled @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were randomly divided into @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@ group (@<m>DISEASE_Myotonic_Dystrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009223 @@@DM@@@ group, n=8) and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@ + @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group (@<m>DISEASE_Myotonic_Dystrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009223 @@@DM@@@+S group, n=8).

citations.NLM: Li FL, Wan X, Wang X, Liu X, Wu YL, Chen HZ, Cui XL. [Simvastatin prevented myocardium of diabetes rats from apoptosis through inhibition of oxidative stress]. Zhongguo Ying Yong Sheng Li Xue Za Zhi. 2018 May 8;34(5):422-426 469. PMID: 30788922
citations.BibTeX: @article{30788922, title={[Simvastatin prevented myocardium of diabetes rats from apoptosis through inhibition of oxidative stress].}, author={Li FL and Wan X and Wang X and Liu X and Wu YL and Chen HZ and Cui XL}, journal={Zhongguo Ying Yong Sheng Li Xue Za Zhi}, volume={34}, number={5}, pages={422-426 469}}

results.title: [Effects of simvastatin on TGF-beta system of diabetic rat kidneys].
results.journal: Zhong Nan Da Xue Xue Bao Yi Xue Ban
results.text_hl: METHODS: Twenty @CHEMICAL_Streptozocin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013311 @@@STZ@@@-induced SD @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ and 10 normal @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were assigned to @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Myotonic_Dystrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009223 @@@DM@@@) group, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ [ 4 mg/( kg x d) ] treatment (S) group and normal control (C) group.

citations.NLM: Chen ZX, Lei MX, Zhu LF, Zhang J. [Effects of simvastatin on TGF-beta system of diabetic rat kidneys]. Zhong Nan Da Xue Xue Bao Yi Xue Ban. 2005 Oct;30(5):593-6. PMID: 16320597
citations.BibTeX: @article{16320597, title={[Effects of simvastatin on TGF-beta system of diabetic rat kidneys].}, author={Chen ZX and Lei MX and Zhu LF and Zhang J}, journal={Zhong Nan Da Xue Xue Bao Yi Xue Ban}, volume={30}, number={5}, pages={593-6}}

results.title: HMG-CoA reductase inhibitors suppress the development and progression of carotid artery intimal-medial thickening in hypercholesterolemic type 2 diabetic patients.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Myotonic_Dystrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009223 @@@type 2 DM@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@ received either @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@ (n = 15) or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (n = 15), while another group of @<m>DISEASE_Myotonic_Dystrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009223 @@@type 2 DM@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with normocholesterolemia did not receive these agents.

citations.NLM: Takahashi T, Ishii N, Itai K, Goto R, Higashi K, Kobori S. HMG-CoA reductase inhibitors suppress the development and progression of carotid artery intimal-medial thickening in hypercholesterolemic type 2 diabetic patients. J Atheroscler Thromb. 2005;12(3):149-53. PMID: 16020915
citations.BibTeX: @article{16020915, title={HMG-CoA reductase inhibitors suppress the development and progression of carotid artery intimal-medial thickening in hypercholesterolemic type 2 diabetic patients.}, author={Takahashi T and Ishii N and Itai K and Goto R and Higashi K and Kobori S}, journal={J Atheroscler Thromb}, volume={12}, number={3}, pages={149-53}}
